message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm starting with a price of $14,000, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would that be possible?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to make a bit more on this product. I'm willing to go down to $12,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I still believe that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
